dc:title: House Sounder, Paper Smaller, Line The Same
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: In the midst of house renovation the bread line continues. Says those who oppose helping the destitute have an "atheistic attitude." Appeals for money and describes their "Little Italy" neighborhood.
